name: create folders in dropbox with sample contact data

parameters.functionCode:
// Generate 30 folders with mock customer names
const customerNames = [
  "Emma Johnson",
  "Liam Smith",
  "Olivia Williams",
  "Noah Brown",
  "Ava Jones",
  "Elijah Garcia",
  "Isabella Martinez",
  "Lucas Rodriguez",
  "Mia Davis",
  "Mason Hernandez",
  "Sophia Lopez",
  "Logan Gonzalez",
  "Amelia Wilson",
  "Ethan Anderson",
  "Harper Thomas",
  "James Taylor",
  "Evelyn Moore",
  "Benjamin Jackson",
  "Charlotte Martin",
  "Henry Lee",
  "Abigail Perez",
  "Sebastian Thompson",
  "Emily White",
  "Alexander Harris",
  "Elizabeth Clark",
  "Daniel Lewis",
  "Scarlett Robinson",
  "Matthew Walker",
  "Victoria Hall",
  "Jack Allen"
];

// Function to generate a random phone number
const generatePhoneNumber = () => {
  const areaCode = Math.floor(Math.random() * 900 + 100); // 3-digit area code
  const prefix = Math.floor(Math.random() * 900 + 100);   // 3-digit prefix
  const lineNumber = Math.floor(Math.random() * 9000 + 1000); // 4-digit line number
  return `+1-${areaCode}-${prefix}-${lineNumber}`;
};

// List of California cities
const californiaCities = [
  "Los Angeles",
  "San Diego",
  "San Jose",
  "San Francisco",
  "Fresno",
  "Sacramento",
  "Long Beach",
  "Oakland",
  "Anaheim",
  "Santa Ana",
  "Riverside",
  "Bakersfield",
  "Stockton",
  "Irvine",
  "Modesto",
  "Oxnard",
  "Fontana",
  "Moreno Valley",
  "Glendale",
  "Huntington Beach"
];

// List of job titles
const jobTitles = [
  "CEO",
  "CTO",
  "CFO",
  "COO",
  "VP of Sales",
  "VP of Marketing",
  "VP of Operations",
  "Director of Engineering",
  "Director of Product",
  "Senior Manager",
  "Project Manager",
  "Business Development Manager",
  "Sales Manager",
  "Marketing Manager",
  "Operations Manager"
];

// Function to get a random city
const getRandomCity = () => {
  return californiaCities[Math.floor(Math.random() * californiaCities.length)];
};

// Function to get a random job title
const getRandomJobTitle = () => {
  return jobTitles[Math.floor(Math.random() * jobTitles.length)];
};

const folders = customerNames.map((name, index) => ({
  folderName: `/Customers/${name}`,
  fileName: `customer_info_${index + 1}.txt`,
  content: `Customer Information for ${name}\n\n` +
    `Customer ID: CUST-${(index + 1).toString().padStart(3, '0')}\n` +
    `Account Manager: John Smith\n` +
    `Industry: Technology\n` +
    `Status: Active\n` +
    `Created at: ${new Date().toISOString()}\n\n` +
    `Notes:\n` +
    `- Primary contact: ${name.split(' ')[0]}@${name.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g, '')}.com\n` +
    `- Phone: ${generatePhoneNumber()}\n` +
    `- City: ${getRandomCity()}, CA\n` +
    `- Job Title: ${getRandomJobTitle()}\n` +
    `- Annual revenue: $${Math.floor(Math.random() * 10000000).toLocaleString()}\n` +
    `- Last contact: ${new Date(Date.now() - Math.random() * 30 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toISOString().split('T')[0]}`
}));

return {folders: folders};
